actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands and Reserved Water.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, Reserved Water and Resource Conservation

official_title: A bill to authorize the establishment of the Jimmy Carter National Historic Site in the State of Georgia and for other purposes.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of the Interior to establish the Jimmy Carter National Historic Site in Georgia. Specifies those properties which the Secretary is authorized to acquire for the establishment of such site. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the establishment of the Jimmy Carter National Historic Site in the State of Georgia and for other purposes.
